name: broughie
description:
how deep can you make it into the dungeon?

a small game, made as a way for me to test out Love2D

controls

  • arrows/wasd: move and attack
  • ctrl-R: restart
  • ctrl-M: mute

the web version should work but also may be a bit unstable; try the .exe version if the web version doesn't work for you

credits
  • game by pancelor
  • code based on https://nluqo.github.io/broughlike-tutorial/
  • music from https://freesound.org/people/BORDELL/sounds/58949/
  • font by droqen
  • sfx generated from https://sfxr.me/
  • some shaders from https://github.com/vrld/moonshine#license
  • html export via https://github.com/Davidobot/love.js
